mods.name: Dark-MoreHardStorms
mods.author: DarkAngel
mods.description: An immersive weather overhaul that reshapes Icarus' climate. Storms are more frequent, last longer, and strike harder, creating a hostile and unpredictable world where timing, shelter, and preparation matter more than ever.

mods.name: Dark-UndersuitsPlus
mods.author: DarkAngel
mods.description: Dark-UndersuitsPlus enhances existing undersuits with improved stats and better balance, making them more useful throughout progression without breaking immersion, compatibility and original identity.

mods.name: Dark-ElectricFabricator
mods.author: DarkAngel
mods.description: Make the Fabricator need energy to work, as it should be from beginning, now the fabricator needs 1500 energy to work. And in adition have moved the waterwheel, Wind Tubine and Spline Tool Electricity to Tier 3.

mods.name: Dark-Workshop
mods.author: DarkAngel
mods.description: Workshop tab with Armour, modules and some other goodies ..

mods.name: Dark-NewMetaExtractionTweaks
mods.author: DarkAngel
mods.description: This mod rebalances and enhances the Meta-tier extraction equipment by improving power management, battery capacity, and crafting costs, making late-game devices more efficient and practical to use. Reduced battery capacity to 25000, crafting costs are rebalanced, the radar now needs meta power source, but the battery is now chargeable in the charging device that can now have 2 slots to charge and the extractor have 2 slots too to add batteries.
